p: Tocilizumab, a humanized monoclonal antibody, inhibits all forms of interleukin-6 (IL-6) receptors (membrane bound or soluble). Tocilizumab was first approved for rheumatoid but was later considered as a complementary treatment in cytokine-release syndrome disease ( Kotch et al., 2019). Tocilizumab can diminish the effect of cytokine storming, including IL-6, which is associated with severe outcomes in patients with COVID-19 ( Zhou et al., 2020a).
